sentences.en: A selection of correspondence from P G Wodehouse realised £ 1,232. P.G.
sentences.cn: 沃德豪斯的书信选集卖了1,232英镑。

sentences.en: Here's another selection of recent letters from our postbag.
sentences.cn: 这是我们从近期公众来信里挑选出的又一批信件。

sentences.en: His name has cropped up at every selection meeting this season.
sentences.cn: 他的名字突然出现在这一季所有选举会议上。

sentences.en: It is invidious to make a selection.
My selection for the team has given me a tremendous lift.
sentences.cn: 入选该队给了我极大的鼓舞。

sentences.en: Political selection is more dependent on sophistry and less on economic literacy.
sentences.cn: 政治选举更多地取决于诡辩的能力，而不在于是否懂经济。

sentences.en: See our selection of autumn favourites and take your pick.
sentences.cn: 看看我们的秋季精选，然后挑出你想要的。

sentences.en: The children have to sit a tough selection test.
sentences.cn: 孩子们必须参加一次严格的选拔测试。

sentences.en: The judges have made their final selection.
sentences.cn: 评委已经作出最后的评选。

sentences.en: The process of judicial selection was held up to ridicule.
sentences.cn: 司法选举的过程成为了笑柄。

sentences.en: The selection process is based on rigorous tests of competence and experience.
sentences.cn: 选拔过程是基于对能力和经验的严格测试。

sentences.en: These drawings represent a selection from a larger exhibition.
sentences.cn: 这些画作是从一个规模更大的展会上选出来的。

sentences.en: They have a huge selection of discontinued cookers.
sentences.cn: 他们有大量绝版的精选炉灶。

sentences.en: To order, just write your selections on the form.
sentences.cn: 订购只需在表上写下你所选的东西。

sentences.en: We sampled a selection of different bottled waters.
sentences.cn: 我们品尝了一系列不同品牌的瓶装水。

sentences.en: We urge colleges and universities to demystify the selection process.
sentences.cn: 我们敦促各学院和大学澄清其甄选学生的过程。

sentences.en: We've rounded up a selection of products.
sentences.cn: 我们已经精心挑选了一些产品。

words.tran_cn: 精选的；挑选出来的；极好的
采集,选择,使决定,分离,区别

phrases.tran_cn: 自然选择；[生]物竞天择说
组合证券投资选择；[经]笼统投资选择
选择压；选择压力；选拔压力
厂址选择；基地选择；位置选择

trans.tran_cn: 挑选，入选者，可供选择的事物
trans.tran_en: the careful choice of a particular person or thing from a group of similar people or things
